articles.title: Video: Phil Mudd says he's seeing a repeat of run-up to January 6 - CNN Video
articles.description: Phil Mudd, who has worked for both the FBI and the CIA, says the rhetoric and threats against FBI agents and Department of Justice officials in the wake of the Mar-a-Lago search reminds him of what he saw leading up to the January 6 insurrection.

articles.author: Amir Vera, Claudia Dominguez
articles.title: Mass shooting in Phoenix, Arizona, leaves 1 dead, 4 injured after a late-night party, police say
articles.description: One man is dead and four other people were injured early Sunday after a mass shooting ended a late-night party in Phoenix, Arizona, according to a news release from city police.
articles.content:

articles.title: Mar-a-Lago -- and its owner -- have long caused concerns for US intelligence

articles.title: Anne Heche's son mourns mother: 'We have lost a bright light'
articles.description: Anne Heche's son paid tribute to his mother Friday, saying the family had lost "a kind and most joyful soul, a loving mother, and a loyal friend."

articles.author: Analysis by John Harwood, CNN
articles.title: Analysis: The same Joe Biden suddenly looks different
articles.description: Joe Biden is no more or less capable a president than he was two months ago. His staff is no more or less competent.
